tt_content.pi_flexform:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="yes" ?> <T3FlexForms> <data> <sheet index="gatedcontent"> <language index="lDEF"> <field index="settings.flexform.gatedcontent.identifier"> <value index="vDEF">gated-content</value> </field> <field index="settings.flexform.gatedcontent.pid"> <value index="vDEF">2</value> </field> <field index="settings.flexform.gatedcontent.userGroups"> <value index="vDEF"></value> </field> </language> </sheet> <sheet index="formdata"> <language index="lDEF"> <field index="settings.flexform.firstNameEnabled"> <value index="vDEF">1</value> </field> <field index="settings.flexform.lastNameEnabled"> <value index="vDEF">1</value> </field> <field index="settings.flexform.companyEnabled"> <value index="vDEF">1</value> </field> <field index="settings.flexform.telephoneEnabled"> <value index="vDEF">1</value> </field> <field index="settings.flexform.zipEnabled"> <value index="vDEF">1</value> </field> <field index="settings.flexform.cityEnabled"> <value index="vDEF">1</value> </field> <field index="settings.flexform.legalNotice"> <value index="vDEF"><p>I have read the general terms and conditions and agree to them.*</p></value> </field> </language> </sheet> <sheet index="finisher"> <language index="lDEF"> <field index="settings.flexform.finisher.saveToDB.enable"> <value index="vDEF">1</value> </field> <field index="settings.flexform.finisher.emailRecipient"> <value index="vDEF">testfinisher@dpool.com</value> </field> <field index="settings.flexform.finisher.emailSubject"> <value index="vDEF">Subject finisher mail</value> </field> <field index="settings.flexform.finisher.emailBody"> <value index="vDEF"><p>Dear admin,</p>
<p>The following data was submitted:</p> <p>Name: {user.name}</p> <p>Company: {user.company}</p> <p>Telephone: {user.telephone}</p> <p>Email: {user.email}</p> <p>Zip: {user.zip}</p> <p>City: {user.city}</p></value> </field> </language> </sheet> <sheet index="doubleOptIn"> <language index="lDEF"> <field index="settings.flexform.doubleOptIn.enable"> <value index="vDEF">1</value> </field> <field index="settings.flexform.doubleOptIn.emailSubject"> <value index="vDEF">Subject double-opt-in mail</value> </field> <field index="settings.flexform.doubleOptIn.emailBody"> <value index="vDEF">double-opt-in-link: {link}</value> </field> </language> </sheet> <sheet index="adminConfirmation"> <language index="lDEF"> <field index="settings.flexform.adminConfirmation.enable"> <value index="vDEF">1</value> </field> <field index="settings.flexform.adminConfirmation.emailRecipient"> <value index="vDEF">testadmin@dpool.com</value> </field> <field index="settings.flexform.adminConfirmation.emailSubject.admin"> <value index="vDEF">Admin: Confirmation Access</value> </field> <field index="settings.flexform.adminConfirmation.emailBody.admin"> <value index="vDEF"><p>click to confirm the access to {identifier}: {link}</p>
<p>The following data was submitted:</p> <p>Name: {user.name}</p> <p>Company: {user.company}</p> <p>Telephone: {user.telephone}</p> <p>Email: {user.email}</p> <p>Zip: {user.zip}</p> <p>City: {user.city}</p></value> </field> <field index="settings.flexform.adminConfirmation.emailSubject.user"> <value index="vDEF">Access confirmed</value> </field> <field index="settings.flexform.adminConfirmation.emailBody.user"> <value index="vDEF"><p>an administrator has confirmed your request.</p> <p>You can now see the requested content via the following link: {link}</p></value> </field> </language> </sheet> <sheet index="template"> <language index="lDEF"> <field index="settings.flexform.gatedcontent.template"> <value index="vDEF">1</value> </field> </language> </sheet> </data> </T3FlexForms>
